#summary How to test the reference app
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

This details how to test pjsua on your iPhone running FW 2.1

= Details =

  # copy pjsip-apps/bin/pjsua-arm-apple-darwin9 to your iphone with scp
  # ssh to the iphone and run ldid -S pjsua-arm-apple-darwin9
  # create a iphone.cfg file with the following content
{{{
--app-log-level=1
--local-port=5063
--no-tcp

--dis-codec=iLBC

--clock-rate=8000
--snd-clock-rate=8000
--ec-tail=0
--quality=2
--no-vad 

--snd-auto-close=0

--add-buddy sip:sipuraspa:5061
}}}
  # run ./pjsua --config iphone.cfg from the command line and *M*ake some test calls
